fields.label: Cover
fields.statement: Benefits to employees in accordance with UAE Federal Labor Law No 8 (Chapter 8 of 1980) and subsequent amendments thereto in respect of work related accidents arising out of or in the course of their employment.

fields.label: 24 Hours Non-Occupational Personal Accident Cover – In UAE And Home Country Benefits As Per UAE Labour Law
Cancellation Clause-30 Days By Either Side On Pro-rata refund of premium

fields.statement: As per UAE Shariah and/or Common Law in respect of work related accidents

fields.label: Law
fields.value: UAE Federal Labour Law No. 8 Of 1980 and subsequent amendments

fields.label: Loss Notification – ‘as Soon As Reasonably Practicable
Riot, Strikes, Civil Commotion And Passive War Risk
Cover For Hernia, Heat/sun Stroke, Muscle Spasm, Muscle Strain, Lumbago Related To Work and Back pain
Claim brought against the fellow, employee, director, partner of the insured or against the principal shall be considered as claim brought to the insured
Various principal/ owners/ director/managers/employees of the insured are considered additional  insured
Cover For Occupational/ Industrial Disease As Per Labour Law

Brokers Claim Handling Clause : A Loss Notification Received By The Insurance Broker Will Be Deemed As A Loss Notification To Insurer. All Communications Flowing Between The Insurer, Insured And The Appointed Loss Surveyor Should Be Channelized Through The Broker, Unless There Is Any Unavoidable Reasons Compelling Direct Communications Between The Parties
Cover for longterm seconded employees, trainees and contract and temporary employees of the insured
Covering liabilty arising out of provision and management of canteen, social, sports, welfare, firstaid services/charitable activities and sponsorship of events
Including Work Related Accidents And Bodily Injuries During Overtime Work, Night Shifts, Work On Public Holidays And Week-ends.

Including cover for insured's employees while on flights and / or commuting from/to country of work , including insured's new employees on employment visas while on incoming flights from any other country to the country of work
Including employee on temporary hire for whom the insured is responsible and / on the insured payroll but not under there sponsership
Cover for hired workers or casual labours
